item.title: Building Pandas Dataframes From Ndarrays
item.author: sample@gmail.com (Saikat Kumar Dey)
item.description: At work, I have to switch between numpy & pandas depending on the computational needs. Numpy is faster. Pandas is easier to work with. One of the tasks I’ve faced often was to convert a 3-dimensional ndarray to a pandas dataframe. I will share my preferred technique in this post today. For the purpose of this exercise, I’ll generate dummy sales data for a retail company. The dimensions include products, locations, and sales.
